floater.name: floater_about
floater.title: About Open Life
floater.text_editor:
OpenLife R16 is brought to you by Sakai, Amy, Kirstenlee, Dawny, Sai, Padre, Xingzo.
Big Thanks to: Gumby, Gitfinger, Osi, Digi, PurplePenny, Kylie, Mac, Surreal and all of OLG!

Computers are like Old Testament gods,lots of rules and no mercy.
